      • invokeMethods

        public boolean invokeMethods(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inputArgs)
        Puts the arguments in the methods and invokes them.

        First loops through the methods and puts arguments in placeholders and then invokes them. If there is a problem with invoking the methods, then say so and print out the usage.

        Parameters:
        inputArgs - The player's input arguments.
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not successful.
